snippet: Decide.com, a Web site that tracks millions of price changes on consumer electronics and appliances to predict when buyers are most likely to get a deal, said laptop prices tend to dip to seasonal lows in late June, the last two weeks of September...
abstract: Decide.com, a Web site that tracks millions of price changes on consumer electronics and appliances to predict when buyers are most likely to get a deal, said laptop prices tend to dip to seasonal lows in late June, the last two weeks of September and again in mid-December.

headline.main: It May Be a Good Time to Buy a Laptop
headline.print_headline: Best Price for Laptops Is a Matter of Timing (and Algorithms)
